SELECT pc1.id AS checkId, pc1.`name` AS checkName, pc1.path AS pathCode, pc1.type AS processType, pc1.part AS checkPartType, pc1.parent_id AS parentId, pc1.if_last AS ifLast FROM process_check pc1 LEFT JOIN process_check pc2 ON pc2.id = pc1.parent_id AND pc2.del_flag=0 WHERE pc1.del_flag = 0 AND pc1.if_last = 1
AND pc1.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{checkName},'%')
AND pc2.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parentCheckName},'%')

SELECT pc1.id AS checkId, pc1.`name` AS checkName, pc1.path AS pathCode, pc1.type AS processType, pc1.part AS checkPartType, pc1.parent_id AS parentId, pc1.if_last AS ifLast FROM process_check pc1 WHERE pc1.del_flag = 0

SELECT id AS checkId, `name` AS checkName, path AS pathCode, part AS checkPartType FROM process_check WHERE del_flag = 0 AND if_last = 1
AND id = #{checkId}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(id SEPARATOR '-') AS checkPathCode, GROUP_CONCAT(`name` SEPARATOR '-') AS checkPathName FROM process_check WHERE 1 = 1
#{checkId}

SELECT pcf.id AS flowId, pcf.node, pcf.node_id AS nodeId, pcf.parent_node_id AS parentNodeId, pcf.role_type AS roleType, pcf.if_appoint AS ifAppoint FROM process_check_flow pcf LEFT JOIN process_check pc ON pc.id = pcf.check_id AND pc.del_flag = 0 WHERE pcf.del_flag = 0 AND pcf.check_id = #{checkId}

SELECT pcp.id AS pointId, pcp.title AS title, pcp.remark AS remark FROM process_check_point pcp LEFT JOIN process_check pc ON pc.id = pcp.check_id AND pc.del_flag = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND pcp.check_id = #{checkId}

SELECT r.ban_code AS partCode, r.ban_name AS partName, r.ban_code AS banCode, r.ban_name AS banName, FROM room r WHERE r.del_flag = 0 AND r.ban_code IN ( SELECT ban_code FROM zxxj_section_scope WHERE 1 = 1 AND section_id = #{sectionId}) AND r.ban_code NOT IN ( SELECT part_code FROM process_detail WHERE del_flag = 0 AND check_id = #{checkId} AND section_id = #{sectionId})
AND r.unit IN ( SELECT unit FROM zxxj_section_scope WHERE 1 = 1 AND section_id = #{sectionId} )
AND r.ban_name = #{roomQuery.banName}
GROUP BY r.ban_code
SELECT pd.* FROM process_detail pd LEFT JOIN process_detail_check_flow pdcf on pd.id = pdcf.detail_id WHERE pdcf.comment = #{content}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM process_detail WHERE del_flag = 0 AND stage_code= #{stageCode}
